Package com.dua3.meja.ui.fx

Class FxSegmentView

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
com.dua3.meja.ui.fx.FxSegmentView
All Implemented Interfaces:
SegmentView, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
public class FxSegmentView extends javafx.scene.control.Control implements SegmentView
FxSegmentView is a JavaFX control that implements the SegmentView interface, representing a view of a segment of a sheet focused within a specific quadrant. The class manages layout and interactions for a section of rows displayed in a grid-like interface with customization options for scaling and displaying without scrollbars.

  • Constructor Details

    • FxSegmentView

      public FxSegmentView(FxSheetView fxSheetView, javafx.geometry.Side side, FxSheetViewDelegate svDelegate, javafx.collections.ObservableList<Row> rows)
      Constructs an instance of FxSegmentView, responsible for displaying either the top (above split) or bottom (below split) part of a sheet in the user interface.
      Parameters:
      fxSheetView - the FxSheetView this segment belongs to
      side - use Side.TOP for the top segment, Side.BOTTOM for the bottom segment
      svDelegate - the delegate responsible for accessing data specific to the SheetView
      rows - the observable list of the rows to display in this quadrant.

  • Method Details

    • requestLayoutForRow

      public void requestLayoutForRow(int i)
      Requests a layout update for a specific row within the segment view.
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the row for which the layout update is requested

    • isAboveSplit

      public boolean isAboveSplit()
      Determines if this segment view is positioned above the split row in the associated sheet.
      Returns:
      true if this segment is above the split row; false otherwise.

    • updateLayout

      public void updateLayout()
      Update layout, i.e.; when the scale or row and/or column sizes change.

    • updateViewSize

      public void updateViewSize(float w, float h)
      Description copied from interface: SegmentView
      Sets the size of the view on the display.
      Specified by:
      updateViewSize in interface SegmentView
      Parameters:
      w - The width of the view in pixels.
      h - The height of the view in pixels.

    • getSheetView

      public FxSheetView getSheetView()
      Retrieves the associated FxSheetView for this segment view.
      Returns:
      the FxSheetView instance this segment belongs to.
